term.title: excitation

item.text: Process causing the transition of a system from one state to another of higher energy.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1541 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
